name: Pitter-Patter Nacchan
description:
Controll Nacchan to catch Siichan.

　In the solo play, arrive at Siichan who is somewhere.

　In the pair play, you can play chasing with Nacchan and Siichan.

　Nacchan walks, runs and rotates.
　But all you need to is just a touch.
　With this elegant UI, enjoy the very new chasing!!!

　Siichan:'Nacchan, come here---!!!'
　Nacchan:'Siichan, wait----!!!'
